author: Jonathan Itin
comment: Pretty good app but it needs an option to save to a photo gallery.  Would be especially useful for GPS tagging when using as an evidence collection tool.  Also a big laggy at times and fails to start.  Otherwise, phenomenal app. 5 stars if these can be changed
title: Needs something

author: MönkéhyBloöd 3245
comment: Can't use watch to start up the app when screen is locked,  plus it disconnects very often,  (auto rotate - disconnected)  after its disconnected you have to manually connect it on the phone every time. I would appreciate the feedback  please and thank you!
title: Dislike

author: Ian Grody
comment: Had to edit my review as I don't feel I gave sufficient reason why this is 'serious innovation'. For one, I dont need to unlock my phone. Can start filming or record audio purely on watch. Don't even need to wake the screen (M2 and Z3 (L and MM)). Filming quality is perfect.Use this with a Z3 and SW3 and the feedback quality to watch is customisable, so can cater to every environment. Photo taking is superior to even Sony camera bridge app. No ads, no spam, no privacy issues. This is pure genious. 10 stars.  Can you pretty please update app to support Oreo. Can film from watch and take photos (Wear 1.5 watch), but app on phone crashes. Also, donate link please. You deserve it!

author: Dan Regev
comment: (LG G Watch R with LG G3) The new version does not show any picture over the watch. It crashes each time I try use the cropping tool.

reply.author: Starnode
reply.content:
Please remove the app from your phone, wait a little time and make sure it also has been removed from your watch (the app is not listed anymore in the start menu) and then re-install it. It appears that the wearable and the phone parts of the app could get our of sync after an upgrade.

Send us a bug report if the app stops when switching cropping.

title: New version 1.2.2 is not working

author: Dr. Marion Mouton
comment: It took awhile to figure it out!  Are there plans to allow saving to SD card?

author: Sidney Poss
comment: Works great with moto 360 and nexus 6
title: Can't ask for more

author: A Google user
comment: Best video frame rate I've seen with moto 360
title: Very good

author: Kit Parenteau
comment: Looks good in general. Watch view freezes while recording video, so it is not useful as a live viewfinder while recording video. So sad.
